entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is stuck in court proceedings. She is mentioned as being involved in the court case and her liberty possibly depending on the outcome.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is struggling to do magic that Harry believes is beyond him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is wandering around on the top floor and knows that his quarry has just gone down in the lift.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge's office must be up here, according to Harry's thought. Her jewelry is also mentioned as unlikely to be kept in her office.

entities.name: muﬄiato charm
entities.description: The Muﬄiato charm has been cast over the place, making the purple-carpeted corridors hushed.

relationships.description: Harry is searching Umbridge's office to make sure she doesn't keep her jewelry there.
Ron is struggling to do magic that Harry believes is beyond him.
